# Users

## Get list of users

```{js}
GET /users/
```


#### Parameters

None

#### Default Response

```{js}
Status: 200 OK
```

```{js}
{
   "users":[
      {
         "comments":[
            2,
            6
         ],
         "email":"testuser1@gmail.com",
         "id":1,
         "name":"Test User 1",
         "recipes":[
            1
         ]
      },
      {
         "comments":[
            1,
            4
         ],
         "email":"TU2@gmail.com",
         "id":2,
         "name":"Test User 2",
         "recipes":[
            2
         ]
      },
   ]
}
```

---

## Add user

```{js}
POST /users/
```

## Get comments made by user

```{js}
GET /users/{user_id}/comments
```

#### Parameters

| Name    | Type | In   | Description |
|---------|------|------|-------------|
| user_id | int  | path |             |

#### Default Response

```{js}
Status: 200 OK
```

```{js}
{
   "user_id": 3,
   "total_comments": 1,
   "comments": [
      {
         "id": 3,
         "recipe_id": 1,
         "content": "Simmer dean"
      }
   ]
}
```

## Get comments for recipe




```
Users:
    * /users
        * GET: Return list of all users
        * POST:  Add user
    * /users/{user_name}
        * GET: Get information about specific user, including submitted recipes and comments
        * PUT: Update user information
        * DELETE: Delete user


Recipes:
    * /recipes
        * GET: List of all recipes
        * POST: Add recipe
    * /recipes/{recipe_id}
        * GET: Get recipe
        * PUT: Update recipe
        * DELETE: Delete recipe


Ingredients:
    * /ingredients
        * GET: Return list of all ingredients
    * /ingredients/{ingredient_id}
        * GET: List of recipe IDs that use ingredient


Comments:
    * /comments
        * GET: Return list of all comments
        * POST: Add comment (supply user ID and recipe ID)
    * /comments/{comment_id}
        * GET: Get comment
        * PUT: Update comment
        * DELETE: Delete comment
```
